sentences.en: As always, when he came here , he felt his natural ebullience desert him.
sentences.cn: 如同往常一样, 他觉得自己一踏进这个地方, 那种天生的感情洋溢的性格顿时就化为乌有.

sentences.en: His natural ebullience began to return.
sentences.cn: 他开始恢复与生俱来的热情奔放。

sentences.en: Let us take you to a wine journey to experience the sexy of Australia, passion of South Africa, ebullience of Chile, elegance of France.
sentences.cn: 带你一场踏上一场葡萄酒之旅，去体验澳洲的性感，南非的热情，智利的奔放，法国的优雅。

sentences.en: She burst into the room with her usual ebullience, and immediately started talking to everyone.
sentences.cn: 她像往常一样兴高采烈地冲进了房间, 立刻跟大家攀谈起来.

sentences.en: She burst into the room with her usual ebullience.
sentences.cn: 她像往常一样兴高采烈地冲进了房间。

words.tran_cn: 奔放；兴高采烈；[物]沸腾；冒泡

trans.tran_cn: （感情等的）奔放，兴高采烈，沸腾
